<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Opportune Backstab](/Feats.aspx?ID=575) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 187 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
A creature within your melee reach is hit by a melee attack from one of your allies.

</column>

---

When your enemy is hit by your ally, you capitalize upon the distraction. Make a Strike against the triggering creature.
name: Opportune Backstab
